org.chocosolver.solver.constraints

Interface ISatFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISelf<Model>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface ISatFactory
extends ISelf<Model>
    A factory dedicated to SAT.


    Since:
    15/07/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

        Returns:
